snippet: FIFA named Japan's Homare Sawa is world player of the year on Monday, while Lionel Messi won the men's honor.
abstract: FIFA named Japan's Homare Sawa is world player of the year on Monday, while Lionel Messi won the men's honor.
lead_paragraph: Marta's five-year run as the top female player in the world came to an end Monday in Zurich when FIFA awarded its Ballon d'Or to midfielder Homare Sawa, who helped Japan win the Women's World Cup last summer in Germany.

headline.main: Sawa and Messi Are FIFA's Players of Year
